item.title: Almost Done
item.description: After a day of searching and following the steps from the guides, I have almost set up my personal blog using Hugo and Github Page. I benefited hugely from this guide from Leehow I got lost a few times, but I managed to keep on track by referring to this guide by 小绵尾巴 which is for Mac users. I met a few problems with git push and pull, I learnt from the answers: fatal: unable to access ’ ‘: Failed to connect to github.
